name: Sand & Gravel Shop
notes: The shop is currently empty; supply has not been delivered yet. This note will be updated once supply is achieved.

name: Bamboo Farm
notes: Entrance is a small tunnel at the listed coords.

name: Sculk Farm
notes: Slow farm. May be converted to zombie farm. Dirt, stone, deepslate convertible.

name: Sorting Barn
notes: Sorter room. Feel free to use; leave 1 item so sorting continues.

name: Lava Farm
notes: Small community lava farm. Good for making obsidian too. Builder got carried away posing next to a massive pumpkin — irrelevant but amusing.

name: Mysterious Grave
notes: Trail of blood(?) leading to Cloud & Vamp’s Spot

name: Manual Spider Farm
notes: All items flow up the bubble elevator into the chest above, so no immediate pickup is needed. If you take items from the chest, please inform the owner.

name: Poppies Iron Farm & Trading Hall
notes: Iron farm with attached trading hall.
